text: Unadushyire mubo wandikiye ibyiza kuri iyi si ndetse no ku munsi w’imperuka, rwose tukwicujijeho. (Allah) aravuga ati "Ibihano byanjye mbihanisha uwo nshaka kandi n’impuhwe zanjye zigera ku biremwa byose. (Izo mpuhwe) nzazigenera abatinya Allah, bakanatanga amaturo ndetse na babandi bemera ibimenyetso byacu
